titles.title: CB 143 You Are My Hiding Place

properties.copyright: Â©1981 Maranatha! Music CCCM Music (Maranatha! Music)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE MY HIDING PLACE.
You always fill my heart with songs of deliverance;
whenever I am afraid I will trust in You, I will trust
in You. Let the weak say, "I am strong in the
strength of the Lord."
